titleStmt.title: The teares of loue: or, Cupids progresse Together vvith the complaint of the sorrowfull shepheardesse; fayre (but vnfortunate) Candida, deploring the death of her deare-lou'd Corauin, a late liuing (and an euer to be lamented) shepheard. In a (passionate) pastorall elegie. Composed by Thomas Collins.
titleStmt.author: Collins, Thomas, fl. 1610-1615.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Purslowe for Henry Bell, and are to be sold at his shoppe without Bishopsgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
